verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Fret <S%H2734><s%> not thyself because of evil-doers <S%H7489><s%>, Neither be thou envious <S%H7065><s%> against them that work <S%H6213><s%> unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%>.
For they shall soon <S%H4120><s%> be cut down <S%H5243><s%> like the grass <S%H2682><s%>, And wither <S%H5034><s%> as the green <S%H3418><s%> herb <S%H1877><s%>.
Trust <S%H982><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>; Dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and feed <S%H7462><s%> on his faithfulness <S%H530><s%>.
Delight <S%H6026><s%> thyself also in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And he will give <S%H5414><s%> thee the desires <S%H4862><s%> of thy heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Commit <S%H1556><s%> thy way <S%H1870><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; Trust <S%H982><s%> also in him <S%H6213><s%>, and he will bring it to pass.
And he will make thy righteousness <S%H6664><s%> to go forth <S%H3318><s%> as the light <S%H216><s%>, And thy justice <S%H4941><s%> as the noon-day <S%H6672><s%>.

Rest <S%H1826><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and wait patiently <S%H2342><s%> for him <S%H2734><s%>: Fret not thyself because of him who prospereth <S%H6743><s%> in his way <S%H1870><s%>, Because of the man <S%H376><s%> who bringeth <S%H6213><s%> wicked devices <S%H4209><s%> to pass <S%H6213><s%>.
Cease <S%H7503><s%> from anger <S%H639><s%>, and forsake <S%H5800><s%> wrath <S%H2534><s%>: Fret <S%H2734><s%> not thyself <S%H389><s%>, it tendeth only to evil-doing <S%H7489><s%>.
For evil-doers <S%H7489><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%>; But those that wait <S%H6960><s%> for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, they shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.
For yet a little while <S%H4592><s%>, and the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall not be <S%H995><s%>: Yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place <S%H4725><s%>, and he shall not be.
But the meek <S%H6035><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, And shall delight <S%H6026><s%> themselves in the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> plotteth <S%H2161><s%> against the just <S%H6662><s%>, And gnasheth <S%H2786><s%> upon him with his teeth <S%H8127><s%>.
The Lord <S%H136><s%> will laugh <S%H7832><s%> at him <S%H7200><s%>; For he seeth that his day <S%H3117><s%> is coming <S%H935><s%>.

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> have drawn out <S%H6605><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and have bent <S%H1869><s%> their bow <S%H7198><s%>, To cast down <S%H5307><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>, To slay <S%H2873><s%> such as are upright <S%H3477><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>.
Their sword <S%H2719><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into their own heart <S%H3820><s%>, And their bows <S%H7198><s%> shall be broken <S%H7665><s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a little <S%H4592><s%> that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> hath Than the abundance <S%H1995><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
For the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be broken <S%H7665><s%>; But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> upholdeth <S%H5564><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the perfect <S%H8549><s%>; And their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> shall be for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
They shall not be put to shame <S%H954><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%>; And in the days <S%H3117><s%> of famine <S%H7459><s%> they shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>.

But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%>, And the enemies <S%H341><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall be as the fat <S%H3368><s%> of lambs <S%H3733><s%>: They shall consume <S%H3615><s%>; in smoke <S%H6227><s%> shall they consume away <S%H3615><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> borroweth <S%H3867><s%>, and payeth not again <S%H7999><s%>; But the righteous <S%H6662><s%> dealeth graciously <S%H2603><s%>, and giveth <S%H5414><s%>.
For such as are blessed <S%H1288><s%> of him shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>; And they that are cursed <S%H7043><s%> of him shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%>.
A man <S%H1397><s%>'s goings <S%H4703><s%> are established <S%H3559><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And he delighteth <S%H2654><s%> in his way <S%H1870><s%>.
Though he fall <S%H5307><s%>, he shall not be utterly cast down <S%H2904><s%>; For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> upholdeth <S%H5564><s%> him with his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

I have been young <S%H5288><s%>, and now am old <S%H2204><s%>; Yet have I not seen <S%H7200><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> forsaken <S%H5800><s%>, Nor his seed <S%H2233><s%> begging <S%H1245><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>.
All the day long <S%H3117><s%> he dealeth graciously <S%H2603><s%>, and lendeth <S%H3867><s%>; And his seed <S%H2233><s%> is blessed <S%H1293><s%>.
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>; And dwell <S%H7931><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%>, And forsaketh <S%H5800><s%> not his saints <S%H2623><s%>; They are preserved <S%H8104><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: But the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, And dwell <S%H7931><s%> therein for ever <S%H5703><s%>.
The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> talketh <S%H1696><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, And his tongue <S%H3956><s%> speaketh <S%H1897><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%>.
The law <S%H8451><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%> is in his heart <S%H3820><s%>; None of his steps <S%H838><s%> shall slide <S%H4571><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> watcheth <S%H6822><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, And seeketh <S%H1245><s%> to slay him <S%H4191><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will not leave <S%H5800><s%> him in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, Nor condemn <S%H7561><s%> him when he is judged <S%H8199><s%>.

Wait <S%H6960><s%> for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>, And he will exalt <S%H7311><s%> thee to inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: When the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are cut off <S%H3772><s%>, thou shalt see it <S%H7200><s%>.
I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> in great power <S%H6184><s%>, And spreading <S%H6168><s%> himself like a green <S%H7488><s%> tree in its native soil <S%H249><s%>.
But one passed by <S%H5674><s%>, and <S%H1245><s%>, lo, he was not: Yea, I sought him <S%H4672><s%>, but he could not be found.
480 <S%H8104><s%> the perfect <S%H8535><s%> man <S%H7200><s%>, and behold the upright <S%H3477><s%>; For there is a happy end <S%H319><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>.
As for transgressors <S%H6586><s%>, they shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>; The end <S%H319><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%>.
But the salvation <S%H8668><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; He is their stronghold <S%H4581><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> helpeth <S%H5826><s%> them <S%H6403><s%>, and rescueth them <S%H6403><s%>; He rescueth them from the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, and saveth <S%H3467><s%> them <S%H2620><s%>, Because they have taken refuge in him.
